title: My.Animal.Shelter-SKIDROW
description:
proudly presents
My Animal Shelter / GSP Software

RELEASE DATE : 20-12-2008          PROTECTION : Nothing
GAME TYPE    : Simulator            DISKS      : 1 CD

Release Notes:

Welcome to the Animal Shelter where many animals big and small
need your care and attention!
Create a happy environment for rescued animals at the animal
shelter, by feeding, washing and playing with them. Play with
kittens, ride horses and teach dogs cool new tricks in the Dog
Agility Course.

You are employed as the animal keeper looking after small
animals, such as fluffy guinea pigs and cute rabbits. Complete
various missions and tasks so you can look after larger
animals and manage different areas of the shelter.

Maintain a good reputation by making sure animals are always
well fed and cared for and animal stalls are kept clean and
warm. Once you have completed the tasks you will be promoted
to Animal Shelter Manager!

So much to discover and explore working at the animal shelter!
